entries.content: Working on welcome screen CSS - Adding new fade-out/fade-in animation layer for logo cubes. User wants random cubes to fade to ~0 opacity and fade back in, creating a "breathing" or "blinking out" effect alongside existing flash and gradient rotation animations.

Successfully added fade-out animation layer to welcome screen. Now have 3 independent animations: flash (brightens), fade-out (dims to 0.05), gradient rotation (continuous). CSS transition increased to 1s for smoother fade effects. Build successful.
Doubled fade-out animation speed: fadeOutDuration 1200→2400ms, fadeInDuration 1000→2000ms, CSS transition 1s→2s. Creates slower, more gentle breathing effect.
Reduced fade-out frequency to prevent too many cubes fading simultaneously: minDelay 3000→5000ms, maxDelay 8000→12000ms. Creates more sparse, subtle breathing effect with fewer cubes fading at once.
Adding fourth animation layer: border radius morphing. Cubes will randomly change their rx attribute (border-radius) to create shape-shifting effect alongside flash, fade-out, and gradient rotation.

Successfully added fourth animation layer: radius morphing. Cubes randomly morph between sharp corners (rx=0), normal (rx=3), and round (rx=10). Config: 6-15s delays, 2.5s morph + 2s return. CSS transition added for smooth shape-shifting. Now have 4 independent animations: flash, fade-out, radius morph, gradient rotation.
Reduced flash brightness from 1.0 to 0.85 opacity to prevent overly bright flashes. Creates more subtle, harmonious flash effect that doesn't overpower other animations.

Added "Sementix" text beneath logo cubes with silver metallic gradient. Text positioned at bottom center of SVG (y=115) with horizontal silver gradient (#555 → #fff → #555) for brushed metal effect. Font: 14px, 600 weight, 0.8 opacity, letter-spacing 0.1em.

Provider Selection Flow Analysis (2025-11-08)

FLOW:
1. User clicks "New Chat" button
2. ChatTabManager.handleNewChatClick() is called
3. It creates/shows ProviderSelectionPopup
4. User selects provider, popup calls createNewChat(providerId)
5. WelcomeScreen hides when first chat created

KEY CONNECTIONS:
- ChatTabManager has ProviderSelectionPopup instance (line 52, 136)
- MessageListFactory owns WelcomeScreen instance (line 19)
- WelcomeScreen.hide() called by MessageListFactory when first message-list created (line 63)
- ChatTabManager receives onNewChat callback injected into dependencies (line 89)

TRIGGER FROM WELCOME:
- WelcomeScreen doesn't directly trigger provider selection
- Need to add button/handler to WelcomeScreen that calls onNewChat
- onNewChat callback is passed through dependencies to any UI component

Replaced "Welcome to Sementix" heading with interactive "Start New Chat" button. Wired callback flow: WelcomeScreen button → onNewChatClick → ChatTabManager.handleNewChatClick() → ProviderSelectionPopup. Button has metallic silver gradient matching logo aesthetic with hover/active states.

Added UI hiding when welcome screen is active. Uses body.welcome-active CSS class to hide message list, user input, and notifications while keeping header visible. Creates clean, focused welcome experience with only header + animated logo + Start New Chat button visible.
